profile.title: Profayilo y’Omukozesa
profile.noPrivateKey: Tewali ‘private key’ ku kyuma kino eky’okufulumya.
profile.importSuccess: Private key etekeddwa ku kyuma kino.
profile.importFailed: Okuteekamu kulemye (akasumuluzo kali kke oba fayiro eyononeka).
profile.keysRotated: Key pair empya ekoleddwa ne public key ewerezeddwa.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Private key yo teriva ku kyuma kino. Fulumya akkopi esibiddwa n’akasumuluzo okuddamu okugikomyawo ku kyuma ekirala.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Oli ku Free—kozesamu Sun/Moon wammanga. W’ogula okufuna emizingo emirala.
profile.backupDesc: Kola backups ezisibiddwa n’akasumuluzo, era odzireetere ku kyuma ekirala okugatta ebintu byo.
profile.followHint: Ebyaabwe bijja kulabikira mu Following bw’oba babikka Status ne ‘Followers’ oba ‘Public’.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fulumya amasimu n’obubaka ebiyingira ku ssimu/imeyilo byo ebiwangiddwa. Amasimu/obubaka ebifuluma biyinza kulaga ennamba ya Chatforia yo.

chat.selectPrompt: Londa obubaka oba ekisenge ky’okweyogerera otandike okuteeka obubaka

status.filesNote: Okutuuka ku fayiro 5. Ekomawo mu ssaawa 24 ku mukutu ogw’obusosoze.

auth.headline: Obubaka obukuuma obutonde n’okuvvuunulwa amangwago
auth.description: Okusiba okuva ku nkomerero okutuuka ku nkomerero, AI evvuunula, obubaka obuzikirira, ne kuyita/mu vidiyo.

feature.encryption: Okusiba okuva ku nkomerero okutuuka ku nkomerero
feature.privacy: Ebyekyama mu maaso. Obubaka bwo, obulamulizi bwo.

auth.desktopTip: Ku kompyuta? Skenna ne ssimu wo ofune app.
auth.tip: Osobola okukozesa Chatforia ku kyuma kyonna — oba okudda ku app okufuna obumanyirivu obusinga obulungi.
auth.scanHint: Skenna ofune app oba ogifungule mu burawuza bwo.

press.title: By’amawulire
press.contact: Bw’oba olina ebibuuzo by’amawulire, tuwandiikire ku press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Bw’oba olina ebibuuzo by’amawulire, tuwandiikire ku press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia ye nsengeka y’obubaka ey’ebyekyama n’okuvvuunula amangwago, ng’eyoleka E2E encryption okusobozesa okunnyonnyola mu ngeri eyekyama n’eyangu.
press.assetsText: Logos, ebifaananyi bya pulogulaamu, n’ebifaananyi by’emprodaka (bijja).

careers.title: Emirimu
careers.intro: Tuli ttiimu entono etondawo omusenge ogw’ebyekyama ogw’ensi yonna. Bw’oyagala encryption, accessibility, n’eby’obulungi mu UX, twandisanyukidde okuwulira ku ggwe.
careers.openRoles: Emirimu egyaggulwo: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.

about.title: Ebikwata ku Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ye messenger ey’ebyekyama, ey’olulimi lwo zonna n’okusiba okuva ku nkomerero okutuuka ku nkomerero, n’okuvvuunula amangwago n’okuyita/vidiyo. Omulamwa gwaffe gwangu: okuyamba abantu okweyambisa—mu byekyama, obutebenkevu, era mu nnimi ez’enjawulo.
about.howDescription: Obubaka busibibwa ku kyuma kyo nga tebunavaamu. Obuvvuunulo, backups, n’okugatta ebyuma byakolebwa nga tukendeeza ku bintu bye tuyinza okulaba.

advertise.title: Olanga ne Chatforia
advertise.description: Tuukirira bakozesa b’obubaka abeenyigira nnyo n’ebitundu eby’obulungi eby’ekitiibwa. Tuweerayo ebitundu bya bannera, sponsorships, n’eby’obulambuzi bya fayiro. Abalina Premium tebabona kulanga.

adsense.withPubId: Kati tuweereza kulanga okuyita mu Google AdSense. Bw’oyagala okutulondoola mu Google Ads, kozesa publisher ID {{pubId}} era osabe managed placement ku bitundu wammanga. Sponsorships ez’oku m meeza ziriyo—kozesamu fom.
adsense.noPubId: Kati tuweereza kulanga okuyita mu Google AdSense. Sponsorships ez’oku m meeza nazo ziriyo—kozesamu fom wammanga.

advertise.noPlacements: Tewali bifo byategekeddwa kati. Bizzemu mu ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Okukozesa kungi n’essaawa empanvu mu chat UI
why.brandSafe: Ebitundu eby’obulungi ku brand; okukoma ku bungi obutennya
why.sponsoredMoments: Emirundi egyasponsoriibwa (nga “Start a Chat” modal) giriyo
why.deals: Endagaano ez’oku m meeza oba okuyita mu AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Webale! Okubuuza kwo kugenze. Tunaakuddamu mangu.
form.mailtoInfo: Tuggalawo kadi y’email yo okutuma okubuuza…

upgrade.title: W’akula
upgrade.subtitle: Londa pulaani ekutuukirira: Plus eggyamu kulanga, Premium efuna eby’amaanyi byonna.

gettingStarted.title: Okutandika
gettingStarted.subtitle: Oli mupya ku Chatforia? Kanu kalagiro kagufulumya mu ddakiika ntono.

alert.text: Akalagiro kano kajja kwongera bwe tuna launching ebirala. Bw’olaba ekibula, tuweeyo ku

section2.title: 2) Tandika obubaka
section2.item1: Kola DM oba Group oteeke obubaka bwo obwasooka.
section2.item2: Kozesa obuvvuunulo bw’amangu okwogerera mu nnimi 100+.
section2.item3: Gezaako obubaka obuzikirira n’‘read receipts’ mu Profayilo → Privacy.

section3.title: 3) Genda mu maaso
section3.item1Part2: omuko (Plus = tewali kulanga, Premium = eby’amaanyi byonna).
section3.item2Part1: Gattako ebyuma ebirala era otekewo backups ezisibiddwa mu

account.q: Nkola ntya oba nkomyawo akawunti yange?
account.a: Wanula app oba kozesa web, koona ku “Kola akawunti”, kakasa email/ssimu. Okuddamu, koona “Werabidde akasumuluzo”.

privacy.q: Obubaka busibiddwa okuva ku nkomerero okutuuka ku nkomerero?
privacy.a: Yee. Obubaka n’okuyita bisibiddwa mu kusooka. Ggwe n’oyo gw’owerezayo mwe musobola okubusoma.

translate.a: Kozesa “Auto-translate” mu Settings → Appearance & Language. Tuvvuunula ku kyuma nga kisoboka; bwe kitakya, tukozesa APIs ez’ensimbi ez’ekyama ne data entono.

contact.a: Tuwandiikire ku support@chatforia.com. Teekamu ebifaananyi n’enkyusa ya app gy’okozeza.

contact.title: Tukwatirako
contact.errorSend: Tekisobose okuweereza. Bambi wandiika ku support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Ekiragiro kino kinnyonnyola engeri Chatforia (“fffe”, “ffe”) gy’ekungaanya, ng’ekozesa, era n’engeri gye gisasangamu amawulire bwe oba okozesa pulogulaamu ne by’obuweereza. Tuteekateeka Chatforia okwewala nnyo ddala data gye tuyinza okulaba.

infoWeCollect.title: Bye tukungaanya
infoWeCollect.account: Ebikwata ku akawunti (n.g., email/ssimu) okuzimba n’okukuuma akawunti.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Ebifa ku by’okuzikirira/okukozesebwa nga crash logs, ekika ky’ekyuma, oba analytics entono okuzimba enkola.

sharing.title: Okusasaanya
sharing.body: Tetutunda bwiino bw’abantu. Tuyinza okusasanya data entono n’abo abatuyamba (n.g., push, analytics) nga waliwo endagaano enkakanyavu.

rights.title: Eddembe lyo
rights.body: Okusinziira ku kitundu kyo (n.g., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), osobola okusaba okutuukirira, okukyusa, okuggyawo, oba okugaana empereza ezimu. Tuwandiikire: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Okutereka & Obukuumi
retention.body: Tutereka kyetaagisa kyokka okukola obuweereza era tukozesa obukuumi obw’ensi yonna. E2E content tetusobola kugisaasaanya.

children.title: Abaana
children.body: Chatforia teyaweereddwa baana abali wansi w’emyaka 13 (oba nga bw’eteekeddwa mu mateeka go).

changes.title: Enkyukakyuka
changes.body: Tujja kubiteeka wano ne tukebera ‘Last updated’ ennaku.

intro.body: Bw’okoza Chatforia okkiriza amateeka gano. Bw’otokikkiriza, tokozesa buweereza.

accounts.title: Akaawunti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Wa bwiino amatuufu era okuume ebyokuyingira byo bulungi.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Ggwe asinga obuvunaanyizibwa ku by’akawunti yo.

acceptableUse.title: Enkozesa entuufu
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Tewali biragalalalira, bya bumenyi bw’amateeka, oba eby’okwesimba; tewali spam oba kukozesa okutambuza ebiyitirivu.

yourContent.title: Ebyo by’owandiika
yourContent.body: Ofuga eby’owandiika ggwe. Otuwa eddembe eryetaagisa okukola obuweereza (n.g., okutambuza, okutereka, obuvvuunulo).

disclaimer.title: Okwewala n’obuvunaanyizibwa
disclaimer.body: Obuweereza buweebwa ‘nga bwe buli’ awatali buweereza bwa bwesige. Okutuuka we kisoboka mu mateeka, Chatforia terivunaanyizibwa ku bibi eby’omu maaso oba eby’ennaku z’omumaaso ebiva mu kukozesa.

changes.title: Enkyukakyuka
changes.body: Tuyinza okuteekamu enkyukakyuka; okukozesa okweyongera ng’olowooza ku nkyukakyuka kitegeeza okukkiriza.

doNotSell.title: Togula Wadde Okugabana Bwiino Bwange
doNotSell.body: Chatforia tegula bwiino bw’abantu. Abatuuze ba California basobola okwongera okubuuza nga bawandiika wammanga nga CPRA bw’eteeka.

cookies.title: Enteekateeka za Cookie
cookies.body: Chatforia ekolawo kuki ntono (n.g., session, security). Tetukozesa kuki za kulanga eziva ebweru. Fuga kuki mu nteekateeka za burawuza bwo.
